description: Saint Althea was once a devoted follower of Surathli until she was corrupted by the Nether Orb of Life. Now, she struggles to maintain her sanity as the Nether Orb forces her to ascend to godhood against her will.
name: Saint Althea

description: Nebodar the Dragon King was thought to be a myth told among children in Rodia. Now, reports have shown that Nebodar has acquired the Nether Orb of Chaos and seeks to use it to bring destruction to our world. He must be stopped at all costs.
name: Nebodar

description: Jotun, the last of his kind, sought to resurrect his people with the help of the Nether Orb of Nature - a relic that his clan believed to be the heart of their god. After journeying around Rodia for many years, he finally acquired the Nether Orb - but instead of reawakening his clan, the orb roused an insatiable bloodlust in Jotun that cannot be quenched.
name: Jotun

description: Hydranox once lived deep in the oceans of Rodia before it stumbled upon the Nether Orb of Sorcery. The Nether Orb transformed Hydranox into a massive, sentient menace, and now it stalks the earth in search of prey.
name: Hydranox

description: Tired of being picked on by the ruler of {CASTLENAME}, Loid sought out the Nether Orb of Death and used it to transform himself into a much larger and even less appealing version of his former self.
name: Loid Prime

description: After suffering countless defeats at the hands of the ruler of {CASTLENAME}, Imp Impington managed to obtain the Nether Orb of Nature. With naught but vengeance on his mind, Impington has used the Nether Orb to ascend to godhood and exact revenge on his archnemesis.
name: Imp Impington Reborn

description: The Ancestor's origins are unknown. This False God used the Nether Orb of Life to ascend to godhood, and spends its days wandering the plains of Rodia in search of devoted followers.
name: The Ancestor

description: Though Caliban suffered defeat at the hands of the ruler of {CASTLENAME}, he can never be truly killed. The lingering effects of the Nether Orbs granted Caliban power beyond imagining as well as everlasting immortality. It is only a matter of time before Caliban fulfills his ambitions to unite Rodia under a new ruler.
name: Caliban the Unredeemed

description: The Mindwurm is a menacing foe who traveled to Rodia from another dimension in order to obtain the Nether Orb of Sorcery. This False God uses the Nether Orb to manipulate his foes into fighting against each other.
name: Mindwurm

description: The Lost Construct is a failed prototype created by Zonte. This former creature was discarded as a disappointment by the God of Wisdom and was thought to be lost forever in the annals of history. It was only by luck that the Lost Construct came in contact with the Nether Orb of Sorcery, enabling it to ascend to a higher power and seek out revenge on those who disbelieved in its power.
name: Lost Construct
